name: CVE-2022-26651
description: An issue was discovered in Asterisk through 19.x and Certified Asterisk through 16.8-cert13. The func_odbc module provides possibly inadequate escaping functionality for backslash characters in SQL queries, resulting in user-provided data creating a broken SQL query or possibly a SQL injection. This is fixed in 16.25.2, 18.11.2, and 19.3.2, and 16.8-cert14.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert1-rc1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert1-rc2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert1-rc3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert1-rc4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert4-rc1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert4-rc2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert4-rc3:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert4-rc4:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:-:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert5:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert7:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert8:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert9:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert6:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert10:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert11:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert12:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:certified_asterisk:16.8:cert13:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:digium:asterisk:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
